name: TRIAREA
description:
This is 2D mini game.

  • topdown
  • action game
  • pixelart style
  • 10 stages in total
  • mouse only
Rules

Avoid bullets, break enemies, and collect jewels!

Tips1: Player receives an extra life every 150,000 pts

Tips2: The smaller the area of the triangle field, the higher item score

System requirements
  • Windows 7+ 64bit
  • DirectX runtime library
